attributes.title: Worst app ever
attributes.review: This was a waist of time this is the worst app to ever be made I really hope it gets taken out of the App Store

attributes.title: terrible app
attributes.review: it took a long time to download and then when it finally did, i went into the app and there were some inappropriate apps popping up on my screen and it crashed my phone.

attributes.title: I am FURIOUS
attributes.review: I cannot believe this app. My son has a rare medical condition called “I-don’t-like-racist-oranges-“ or IDLRO for short. THIS APP IS FULL OF THEM!!! I am so angry and will be leaving a one star review 🦟🦗🦟🦗🦟🦗🦟🦗🦟🦗🦟🦗

attributes.title: RATE THIS APP A 1 STAR
attributes.review: Just go ahead and delete this app if you already have it. It’s not worth your time, and plus we need to save tiktok! SHARE THE WORD
i got the app to see if it worked well and it was horribly laggy and would kick me off over and over again. you would think with all trumps money he could invest it in a better app :/
this app was so bad and gave me such horrible lag and i overall would not recommend it because his plans for later on just do not make sense and i do not like them. if i could give a 0, i would’ve.

attributes.title: not impressed 👎🏻
attributes.review: i heard that downloading the app gives out good vibes and peace to the world. this however, did not happen and instead made america more chaotic and stressful. would not recommend downloading it. such a waste of my phone 7 storage :((

attributes.title: 🤢ew trumpo🤢
attributes.review: the app is lagging 24/7 and constantly glitching and taking me back to where i started. you would think being that rich would mean you could afford to make it good quality but i guess that’s what’s expected of the rapist cheeto

attributes.title: Disappointed
attributes.review: Did not inform me at all I’m very disappointed, what a waste of time
